ember-flexberry-data.name: ember-flexberry-data
ember-flexberry-data.description: Ember Addon that adds support of projections in models.

params.name: promises
params.description: Array to which custom 'preSave' promises could be pushed

Adapter.OData.name: Adapter.OData
Adapter.OData.description:
The OData adapter class.
Uses Flexberry Query as a language for requesting server.

Projection.AdapterMixin.name: Projection.AdapterMixin
Projection.AdapterMixin.description:
Mixin for {{#crossLink "DS.Adapter"}}Adapter{{/crossLink}} to support
fetching models using projection.

CopyableMixin.name: CopyableMixin
CopyableMixin.description: Mixin for base model to support creating record by prototype.

Offline.ModelMixin.name: Offline.ModelMixin
Offline.ModelMixin.description:
Mixin for Ember models.
Adds metadata properties that can be used to resolve synchronization conflicts.
Creation and changing date and time of record will be filled with current date and time on model saving.
It's recommended to use this mixin when model class extends subclass of [DS.Model](http://emberjs.com/api/data/classes/DS.Model.html) or
includes other mixins, i.e. it's not inherited directly from [DS.Model](http://emberjs.com/api/data/classes/DS.Model.html).
Also it can be used explicitly when it is not necessary to use projections for particular model in application.
If model class inherited directly from [DS.Model](http://emberjs.com/api/data/classes/DS.Model.html) and it's planned to use projections,
then it's recommended to extend model class from {{#crossLink "Offline.Model"}}{{/crossLink}}.

Projection.StoreMixin.name: Projection.StoreMixin
Projection.StoreMixin.description:
Mixin for {{#crossLink "DS.Store"}}Store{{/crossLink}} to support
fetching models using projection.

Projection.Model.name: Projection.Model
Projection.Model.description: Base model that supports projections, validations and copying.

Offline.Model.name: Offline.Model
Offline.Model.description:
Model with projections and additional metadata for offline support.
All metadata properties will be added to all projections (also for relationships).

Query.IsOfPredicate.name: Query.IsOfPredicate
Query.IsOfPredicate.description:
The predicate class that implements the isof function.

Its constructor implements the following signatures:
  - `new IsOfPredicate(typeName)`
  - `new IsOfPredicate(expression, typeName)`

Where:
  - `typeName` - type name to which the current instance will be assigned.
  - `expression` - an expression relative to the current instance that must point to an object for assigning a type.

params.name: modelName
params.description: The model name of the requested entities.

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the requested entity.

params.name: projectionName
params.description: The name of used projection for reading the requested entities.

params.name: predicate
params.description: The predicate that contains filtering conditions for requested entities.

params.name: top
params.description: The number of items in the queried collection to be included in the result.

params.name: skip
params.description: The number of items in the queried collection that are to be skipped and not included in the result.

params.name: count
params.description: Flag indicates to request a count of the matching entities included with the entities in the response.

params.name: expand
params.description: Specifies the related entities to be included in line with retrieved entities.

params.name: select
params.description: A specific set of properties for each requested entity.

params.name: primaryKeyName
params.description: The name of primary key field for specified model name in modelName property.

params.name: extend
params.description: An additional computed set of properties for each requested entity. Based on properties in predicate and order, but not included in select and expand.

params.name: dataType
params.description: A data type for the request. Supported types: 'json' and 'blob'.

DecimalTransform.name: DecimalTransform
DecimalTransform.description: Transformation for model's attributes defined as DS.attr with type 'decimal'. It extends number transformation from ember data.

FileTransform.name: FileTransform
FileTransform.description: Transformation for model's attributes defined as DS.attr with type 'file'. Transformation is necessary in order to detach file attributes from another string attributes on model level. It extends string transformation from ember data, without any changes.

FlexberryEnumTransform.name: FlexberryEnumTransform
FlexberryEnumTransform.description:
Base transform class that implements an enumeration type.
During serialization\deserialization it converts values to captions and vise versa.

GuidTransform.name: GuidTransform
GuidTransform.description: Transformation for model's attributes defined as DS.attr with type 'guid'. It extends number transformation from ember data.

classitems.description:
A method to send batch update, create or delete models in single transaction.

It is recommended to create new models with identifiers, otherwise, after saving, the model object in the store will be created anew.

The array which fulfilled the promise may contain the following values:
- `new model object` - for records created without client id.
- `same model object` - for created, updated or unaltered records.
- `null` - for deleted records.
classitems.name: batchUpdate

params.name: models
params.description: Is array of models or single model for batch update.

return.description: A promise that fulfilled with an array of models in the new state.

classitems.description: Loads value from object by specified attribute path.

Returns complex filter function for `and` condition.
Result function filters array of objects and returns those, for which
all attribute filter functions returned `true`.
Result function uses short circuit logic ([wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short-circuit_evaluation)).

Returns complex filter function for `or` condition.
Result function filters array of objects and returns those, for which
at least one attribute filter function returned `true`.
Result function uses short circuit logic ([wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short-circuit_evaluation)).
Returns query data for querying OData feed (for query part).

Otherwise only requested record will be synced down without related records.
If set to true then it may cause errors in case of loops are present in model structure.
Gets from application config.

classitems.description:
A method to send batch update, create or delete models in single transaction.

It is recommended to create new models with identifiers, otherwise, after saving, the model object in the store will be created anew.

The array which fulfilled the promise may contain the following values:
- `new model object` - for records created without client id.
- `same model object` - for created, updated or unaltered records.
- `null` - for deleted records.
classitems.name: batchUpdate

params.name: models
params.description: Is array of models or single model for batch update.

params.name: useOnlineStore
params.description: Allow to explicitly specify online or offline store using independently of global online status.

return.description: A promise that fulfilled with an array of models in the new state.

classitems.description:
Converts a camelized string into all lower case separated by underscores.
```javascript
'innerHTML'.decamelize();           // 'inner_html'
'action_name'.decamelize();        // 'action_name'
'css-class-name'.decamelize();     // 'css-class-name'
'my favorite items'.decamelize();  // 'my favorite items'
```
classitems.name: decamelize

classitems.description:
Replaces underscores, spaces, or camelCase with dashes.
```javascript
'innerHTML'.dasherize();          // 'inner-html'
'action_name'.dasherize();        // 'action-name'
'css-class-name'.dasherize();     // 'css-class-name'
'my favorite items'.dasherize();  // 'my-favorite-items'
'privateDocs/ownerInvoice'.dasherize(); // 'private-docs/owner-invoice'
```
classitems.name: dasherize

classitems.description:
Returns the lowerCamelCase form of a string.
```javascript
'innerHTML'.camelize();          // 'innerHTML'
'action_name'.camelize();        // 'actionName'
'css-class-name'.camelize();     // 'cssClassName'
'my favorite items'.camelize();  // 'myFavoriteItems'
'My Favorite Items'.camelize();  // 'myFavoriteItems'
'private-docs/owner-invoice'.camelize(); // 'privateDocs/ownerInvoice'
```
classitems.name: camelize

classitems.description:
Returns the UpperCamelCase form of a string.
```javascript
'innerHTML'.classify();          // 'InnerHTML'
'action_name'.classify();        // 'ActionName'
'css-class-name'.classify();     // 'CssClassName'
'my favorite items'.classify();  // 'MyFavoriteItems'
'private-docs/owner-invoice'.classify(); // 'PrivateDocs/OwnerInvoice'
```
classitems.name: classify

classitems.description:
More general than decamelize. Returns the lower\_case\_and\_underscored
form of a string.
```javascript
'innerHTML'.underscore();          // 'inner_html'
'action_name'.underscore();        // 'action_name'
'css-class-name'.underscore();     // 'css_class_name'
'my favorite items'.underscore();  // 'my_favorite_items'
'privateDocs/ownerInvoice'.underscore(); // 'private_docs/owner_invoice'
```
classitems.name: underscore

classitems.description:
Returns the Capitalized form of a string
```javascript
'innerHTML'.capitalize()         // 'InnerHTML'
'action_name'.capitalize()       // 'Action_name'
'css-class-name'.capitalize()    // 'Css-class-name'
'my favorite items'.capitalize() // 'My favorite items'
'privateDocs/ownerInvoice'.capitalize(); // 'PrivateDocs/ownerInvoice'
```
classitems.name: capitalize

Missing item type
Returns complex filter function for `and` condition.
Result function filters array of objects and returns those, for which
all attribute filter functions returned `true`.
Result function uses short circuit logic ([wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short-circuit_evaluation)).

Missing item type
Returns complex filter function for `or` condition.
Result function filters array of objects and returns those, for which
at least one attribute filter function returned `true`.
Result function uses short circuit logic ([wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short-circuit_evaluation)).
